item.title: Certificate Authorities
item.description: AJF8729 ROOT CA 02 Certificate CRL AJF8729 AD SIGNING CA 02 Certificate CRL Delta CRL

item.title: Part 01: VM Creation & Initial Configuration
item.description: Create VMs https://github.com/ajf8729/Lab/blob/main/NewLabVM.ps1 # Example syntax to create a VM using NewLabVM.ps1 # Run from host running Hyper-V $Parameters = @{ LabName = LAB01 VMHostname = LAB01DC01A MemoryStartupMB = 1024 MemoryMaximumMB = 2048 ProcessorCount = 2 VirtualSwitchName = INTERNAL DiskCount = 1 VHDPath = 'D:\Virtual Hard Disks\' VHDSizeGB = 100 ISOPath = 'D:\Software\20348.169.210806-2348.fe_release_svc_refresh_SERVER_EVAL_x64FRE_en-us.iso' Verbose = $true } .

item.title: Part 02: Active Directory Domain Services - Installation and Configuration
item.description: Install Active Directory Domain Services https://github.com/ajf8729/Lab/blob/main/NewLabDomain.ps1 # Example syntax to install AD DS using NewLabDomain.ps1 # Run from host running Hyper-V $Parameters = @{ LabName = LAB01 VMHostname = LAB01DC01A Username = Administrator Password = 'bf1456b8-a91f-4a41-92a8-8388ff07dd6d' DomainName = lab01.domain.tld DomainNetBIOSName = LAB01 SafeModeAdministratorPassword = 'bf1456b8-a91f-4a41-92a8-8388ff07dd6d' Verbose = $true } .\NewLabDomain.ps1 @Parameters Configure Active Directory Domain Services https://github.

item.title: Part 03: ConfigMgr - SQL Installation and Configuration
item.description: Join ConfigMgr server to domain https://github.com/ajf8729/Lab/blob/main/DomainJoinLabVM.ps1 # Example syntax to join domain using DomainJoinLabVM.ps1 # Run from host running Hyper-V # This script will prompt for appropriate domain credentials $Parameters = @{ LabName = LAB01 VMHostname = LAB01DC01A Username = Administrator Password = '3d05c285-f4cb-49bc-bc0f-9ee196a31339' DomainName = lab01.domain.tld Verbose = $true } .\DomainJoinLabVM.ps1 @Parameters Configure ConfigMgr Server https://github.

item.title: Part 04: ConfigMgr - Prerequisites and Site Installation
item.description: Install Windows features https://github.com/ajf8729/Lab/blob/main/conf/WindowsFeatures.txt https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ajf8729/Lab/main/conf/WindowsFeatures.txt Install-WindowsFeature -Name (Get-Content -Path F:\SOURCE\WindowsFeatures.txt) -Verbose Extend AD schema https://github.com/ajf8729/Lab/blob/main/conf/ConfigMgr_ad_schema.ldf https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ajf8729/Lab/main/conf/ConfigMgr_ad_schema.ldf Save ConfigMgr_ad_schema.ldf to DC and edit it Find/Replace all DC=x with DC=ad,DC=domain,DC=com (substitute your domain DC) ldifde.exe -i -f ConfigMgr_ad_schema.ldf -v WSUS Postinstall "C:\Program Files\Update Services\Tools\WsusUtil.exe" postinstall SQL_INSTANCE_NAME="configmgr.ad.domain.tld" CONTENT_DIR="F:\WSUS" (replace configmgr.ad.domain.tld with the FQDN of you ConfigMgr server) Install Windows 11 ADK adksetup.exe /features OptionId.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Anthony J. Fontanez Email: ajf@anthonyfontanez.com LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/ajf8729 Blog: https://anthonyfontanez.com/ GitHub: https://github.com/ajf8729 Resume: https://anthonyfontanez.com/Resume.pdf Summary An enthusiastic and highly skilled IT professional in the Microsoft ecosystem, with excellent technical abilities and communication skills. Highly experienced in managing client and server operating systems via Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manager, Active Directory/Group Policy, and PowerShell. Moderately experienced with Azure Active Directory and Intune. Experience System Administrator Rochester Institute of Technology 2012-09 - 2020-04 Managed ~5,000 Windows client endpoints and ~300 Windows server endpoints across 1 main campus, and 2 remote campuses, via Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manger (ConfigMgr).

item.title: How to Upgrade ConfigMgr
item.description: The following will show you how to upgrade a ConfigMgr site to the latest available update. [CmdletBinding()] Param() if ( -not (Test-Path -Path "$env:SMS_ADMIN_UI_PATH\..\ConfigurationManager.psd1") ) { Write-Error -Message "ConfigurationManager module does not exist." exit } # Import the ConfigurationManager module Import-Module -FullyQualifiedName "$env:SMS_ADMIN_UI_PATH\..\ConfigurationManager.psd1" # Get the site code $SiteCode = (Get-CimInstance -Namespace ROOT/SMS -ClassName SMS_ProviderLocation).SiteCode # Change to the site psdrive Set-Location -Path "$($SiteCode):" # Find the latest update $LatestSiteUpdate = (Get-CMSiteUpdate -Fast | Sort-Object -Descending -Property LastUpdateTime | Select-Object -First 1).

item.title: About
item.description: Windows Sysadmin, focused on ConfigMgr, Intune, PowerShell, Active Directory, Azure AD, & Security. Administration team member for the WinAdmins Community. This site is primarily for things related to my lab, please see AJF Tech Chatter for my production blog.

item.title: 05 ConfigMgr - Site Configuration
item.description: Configure ConfigMgr site https://github.com/ajf8729/Lab/blob/main/04-ConfigureCM.ps1 Create OU-based collections https://github.com/ajf8729/Lab/blob/main/05-CreateOUCollectionStructure.ps1 Install CM client on LABCM01 "F:\Program Files\Microsoft Configuration Manager\Client\ccmsetup.exe" Configure Client Settings New-CMClientSetting -Name "LAB Default Client Settings" -Type Device New-CMClientSettingDeployment -Name "LAB Default Client Settings" -CollectionName "All Systems" Edit “LAB Default Client Settings” Computer Agent Organization name PowerShell execution policy Software Center Company name Color scheme Foreground color Disable “Hide installed applications” Enable “Hide Application Catalog” Software Updates Enable software updates Enable third party software updates Install/Configure Software Update Point https://github.

item.title: 06 Active Directory Certificate Services
item.description: Install AD CS roles Install-WindowsFeature -Name ADCS-Cert-Authority,ADCS-Web-Enrollment -IncludeManagementTools Create PKI A record Add-DnsServerResourceRecordA -Name pki -IPv4Address 172.20.1.101 -ZoneName lab.dev.ajf8729.com Configure enterprise subordinate certificate authority https://christopherkibble.com/posts/standing-up-a-microsoft-certificate-authority-part-2/ Configure CDP http://pki.lab.dev.ajf8729.com/CertEnroll/<CaName><CRLNameSuffix><DeltaCRLAllowed>.crl Include in CRL Include in CDP extension Configure AIA http://pki.lab.dev.ajf8729.com/CertEnroll/<ServerDNSName>_<CaName><CertificateName>.crt Include in AIA extension Import root CA cert into domain root GPO Unpublish all currently published templates Configure “Kerberos Authentication” template Clone “Kerberos Authentication” template as “AJF8729 LAB Kerberos Authentication” Raise compatibility settings to maximum Cryptography settings: Provider category: KSP Algorithm: RSA Minimum key size: 2048 bit Cryptographic provider: Software KSP Hashing: SHA256 Subject name: Fully distinguished name SAN: DNS name Configure “Workstation Authentication” template Clone “Workstation Authentication” template as “AJF8729 LAB Workstation Authentication” Raise compatibility settings to maximum Cryptography settings: Provider category: KSP Algorithm: RSA Minimum key size: 2048 bit Cryptographic provider: Software KSP Hashing: SHA256 Subject name: DNS name SAN: DNS name Security: Domain Computers -> Add Autoenroll Configure “Web Server” template Clone “Web Server” template as “AJF8729 LAB Web Server” Raise compatibility settings to maximum Cryptography settings: Provider category: KSP Algorithm: RSA Minimum key size: 2048 bit Cryptographic provider: Software KSP Hashing: SHA256 Subject name: DNS name SAN: DNS name Security: Cert_WebServer -> Add Enroll, Autoenroll Enable new templates for enrollment Configure certificate autoenrollment settings in domain root GPO

item.title: 07 ConfigMgr - HTTPS Configuration
item.description: https://anthonyfontanez.com/index.php/2021/05/28/migrating-configmgr-to-https-only/ Configure “AJF8729 LAB ConfigMgr DP Client” certificate template Install Fallback Status Point Add-CMFallbackStatusPoint -SiteSystemServerName labcm01.lab.dev.ajf8729.com Configure IIS HTTPS bindings Enable certificate use when available Add root CA certificate to site Enable MP HTTPS Set-CMManagementPoint -SiteSystemServerName "labcm01.lab.dev.ajf8729.com" -EnableSsl $true Enable DP HTTPS Set-CMDistributionPoint -SiteSystemServerName "labcm01.lab.dev.ajf8729.com" -ClientCommunicationType Https -CertificatePath "C:\LAB\AJF8729 LAB ConfigMgr DP Client 2021.11.03.pfx" -CertificatePassword (Read-Host -Prompt "Enter PFX Password" -AsSecureString) Verify communication Set site to HTTPS-only Set-CMSite -SiteCode LAB -ClientComputerCommunicationType HttpsOnly

item.title: 08 ConfigMgr - Data Warehouse Service Point
item.description: Create Reporting Services Point account New-ADUser -Name svc_CM_DW -SamAccountName svc_CM_DW -CannotChangePassword $true -PasswordNeverExpires $true -Path "OU=CM,OU=Servers,OU=AJF8729,DC=ad,DC=ajf8729,DC=com" -AccountPassword (Read-Host -Prompt "Enter password" -AsSecureString) -KerberosEncryptionType AES128,AES256 -ChangePasswordAtLogon $false -DisplayName svc_CM_DW -Enabled $true -UserPrincipalName "svc_CM_DW@ad.ajf8729.com" -Description "ConfigMgr Data Warehouse Service Point Account" Install Reporting Services Point New-CMAccount -UserName "AD\svc_CM_DW" -Password (Read-Host -Prompt "Enter password" -AsSecureString) Add-CMDataWarehouseServicePoint -SiteSystemServerName adcm01.ad.ajf8729.com -DataWarehouseDatabaseServerName adcm01.ad.ajf8729.com -DataWarehouseDatabaseName CM_AD0_DW -DataWarehouseSqlPort 1433 -UserName "AD\svc_CM_DW"

item.title: 09 ConfigMgr - Reporting Services Point
item.description: Download SQL Server Reporting Services https://docs.microsoft.com/sql/reporting-services/install-windows/install-reporting-services https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=100122 https://download.microsoft.com/download/1/a/a/1aaa9177-3578-4931-b8f3-373b24f63342/SQLServerReportingServices.exe Prepare gMSA for SSRS New-ADServiceAccount -Name svc_CM_SSRS -SamAccountName svc_CM_SSRS -DNSHostName adcm01.ad.ajf8729.com -KerberosEncryptionType AES128,AES256 -Path "OU=CM,OU=Servers,OU=AJF8729,DC=ad,DC=ajf8729,DC=com" -PrincipalsAllowedToRetrieveManagedPassword (Get-ADGroup -Identity CM_Servers) Install-ADServiceAccount -Identity svc_CM_SSRS Test-ADServiceAccount -Identity svc_CM_SSRS Restart-Computer Grant gMSA “Log on as a service” URA in ConfigMgr GPO Install SSRS SQLServerReportingServices.exe /passive /norestart /InstallFolder="E:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server Reporting Services" /IAcceptLicenseTerms /Edition=Dev Configure SSRS Launch “Report Server Configuration Manager” Connect to the report server instance “SSRS” Configure the service account as AD\svc_CM_SSRS$ Configure the database, accepting all defaults Configure the Web Service URL Configure the Web Portal URL Verify URLs are accessible https://adcm01.

item.title: 10 ConfigMgr - Misc Roles
item.description: Asset Intelligence Synchronization Point Add-CMAssetIntelligenceSynchronizationPoint -SiteSystemServerName labcm01.lab.dev.ajf8729.com -Verbose Endpoint Protection Point Add-CMEndpointProtectionPoint -SiteSystemServerName labcm01.lab.dev.ajf8729.com -LicenseAgreed $true -ProtectionService AdvancedMembership -Verbose

item.title: 11 Azure AD - Configuration
item.description: Create domain “dev.ajf8729.com in DigitalOcean Configure domain “dev.ajf8729.com” in Azure AD https://github.com/ajf8729/Lab/blob/main/08-ConfigureAzureADDomain.ps1 Script will wait until DNS TXT record is created Configure LABDC01A for TLS 1.2 https://github.com/ajf8729/Lab/blob/main/09-ConfigureTLS1.2.ps1 Computer will automatically restart after 10 seconds Install Azure AD Connect on LABDC01A (2.0.28.0 as of 2021-11-02) https://www.microsoft.com/download/details.aspx?id=47594 msiexec.exe /i AzureADConnect.msi /qn Disable IE Enhanced Security Mode Set-ItemProperty -Path "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Active Setup\Installed Components\{A509B1A7-37EF-4b3f-8CFC-4F3A74704073}" -Name "IsInstalled" -Value 0 Initial setup Move AADC related objects to T0 OU Get-ADGroup -Filter "Name -like 'ADSync*'" | Move-ADObject -TargetPath "OU=T0,DC=lab,DC=dev,DC=ajf8729,DC=com" Get-ADUser -Filter "Name -like 'MSOL_*'" | Move-ADObject -TargetPath "OU=T0,DC=lab,DC=dev,DC=ajf8729,DC=com" Get-ADServiceAccount -Filter "Name -like 'ADSync*'" | Move-ADObject -TargetPath "OU=T0,DC=lab,DC=dev,DC=ajf8729,DC=com" Customize synchronization options Configure hybrid join Configure device writeback Enable Seamless SSO https://github.

item.title: 12 ConfigMgr - Co-management
item.description: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/client-management/mdm/enroll-a-windows-10-device-automatically-using-group-policy#configure-the-auto-enrollment-for-a-group-of-devices

item.title: 13 Windows Hello for Business
item.description: Configure Hybrid Azure AD Key Trust https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/security/identity-protection/hello-for-business/hello-hybrid-key-trust Grant Key Admins access: Add-ADGroupMember -Identity "Key Admins" -Members (Get-ADUser -Filter {name -like "MSOL*"}) Configure GPO Workstation - Windows Hello for Business -> Linked to Workstations OU “Use Windows Hello for Business” -> Enabled Create trusted certificate configuration profiles

item.title: 14 Autopilot
item.description: Configure Autopilot profile https://endpoint.microsoft.com/#blade/Microsoft_Intune_Enrollment/DeploymentProfilesBlade Create -> Windows PC Name: “AJF8729 LAB Default Autopilot Profile” Convert all targeted devices to Autopilot -> Enabled Privacy settings: Show User account type: Administrator Assignments: All devices

item.title: 15 OneDrive for Business, Known Folder Move, and Enterprise State Roaming
item.description: Configure OneDrive for Business (ODfB) and Known Folder Move (KFM) https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/onedrive/use-group-policy https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/onedrive/redirect-known-folders Copy ADMX from %localappdata%\Microsoft\OneDrive\BuildNumber\adm\ to central store Create GPO Workstation - OneDrive for Business and link to Workstations OU “Allow syncing OneDrive accounts for only specific organizations” -> Specify tenant ID “Prevent users from redirecting their Windows known folders to their PC” - Enabled “Silently move Windows known folders to OneDrive” -> Enabled, specify tenant ID, show notification, select all folders “Silently sign in users to the OneDrive sync app with their Windows credentials” -> Enabled “Specify the OneDrive location in a hybrid environment” -> Enabled, set to SharePoint Online Configure Enterprise State Roaming (ESR) https://docs.

item.title: 16 Patch My PC
item.description: Download current Patch My PC installer (2.0.9.0 as of 2021-09-01) https://patchmypc.com/msi Install Patch My PC msiexec.exe /i PatchMyPC-Publishing-Service.msi /qb Create folder for content New-Item -Path 'F:\' -Name "PMPC" -ItemType Directory | Out-Null Configure Patch My PC Enable “Limited trial mode” Enable preview builds Update to latest preview build (2.0.9.1 as of 2021-09-01) Enable creation of ConfigMgr apps Configure SMS Provider connection Set source folder to F:\PMPC Enable “Do not include the version name in the application name” Enable “Trigger software update point sync when new third party updates are published” Enable updates and ConfigMgr app for Firefox x64 Run publisher sync
